name: Rise (itch) (Aer0Games)
description:
Description:

Enter into a dangerous and dark tower which
no one dares to enter.
Until one day a hooded man attempts
to make a name for himself
and RISE higher than any other.

Keyboard Controls:

ASWD - Move
Left Mouse Button - Shoot
Right Mouse Button - Teleport
Mouse Scroll Wheel - Change Spells
Enter - Start Game
Esc - Exit Game

Credits

Programming - Aer0
Enemy Artwork - Redshrike/Ansimuz
Music - Kevin Macleod
